@template unconfirmedaccount
{{div: class=white}}
{{div: class=container why-page}}
@col12
h1. Please validate your Account

Thank you for signing up. You are only 1 step away from entering Mothership{{html:<sup>1</sup>}}.

We will verify your account using 1 USD PayPal payment that is automatically refunded. This means you will see a 1 USD charged and 1 USD refunded on your credit card or PayPal balance. We will NOT create a subscription or allowance on your PayPal account for future billing.

After this payment, you will automatically be redirected to your Cloud Space at Mothership{{html:<sup>1</sup>}}. We provide you with some free test credit so you can try it right away!

{{html:
<div ng-controller="AccountValidationController" ng-cloak>

    <a class="btn btn-small margin-top-small border-radius padding-all-small" style="border: 1px solid #06a7e2;" ng-click="validateWithPayPal()">
        Validate account by <img src="/$$space/.files/img/payment/paypal_logo.gif" class="padding-horizontal-medium" alt="Validate now by using PayPal (No Charges Apply)" style="height: 25px;"/>
    </a>
</div>
<script src="/$$space/.files/js/controllers/SignUp/AccountValidationController.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script src="/$$space/.files/js/services/PaypalPayments.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
}}

{{html:
<br>
Note: in case of any issues during this validation, please contact us on <a href="mailto:support@mothership1.com">support@mothership1.com</a> or use the live chat.
}}

@divend
@divend
@divend
